title: Warring Kingdoms Katarina Visual Bug
body: Whenever you recall with this skin on, Katarina throws her dagger up into the air, catching it and neatly spinning it around on her forefinger. Or at least, that's what is supposed to happen. Currently, whenever she throws the dagger up, it spazzes out and jerks around in the air before finally coming down for Katarina to catch it.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! Looks like the animation was re-exported, which may have caused the animation to become compressed. D: I can follow up with the team and see if we can get this re-exported again properly, which should resolve the issue. :)
